'''''pitya''''' is a [[Quenya]] adjective which means "little".<ref>{{PE|Eldarin}}, p. 115</ref>

==Examples==
* ''[[Pityafinwë|'''Pitya'''finwë]]'' = "Little Finwë"
* ''[[Pitya-naukor‎|'''Pitya'''-naukor]]'' = "Petty-dwarves"
